channel.title: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?
channel.description:
I really like the tune in the demo track for the acoustic guitars. It just sounds so melancholic and nostalgic and agh I love it.
Am I allowed to create a remix of it and put it on SC? Thanks in advance!

item.title: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
I understood that the devs made every demo, not the producers.

Read full topic
item.source: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?

item.title: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Sorry, I don’t know for sure.
I think it’s a ‘case by case’ basis as some are from Lenberg, some for people who are members here and some from pro producers (as was the case with the sound packs).

Read full topic
item.source: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?

item.title: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?
item.dc:creator: Lex
item.description:
That confirms it then ^^ do you by any chance know if we’re allowed to remix any of the tracks that are featured in the feed in the Auxy app that allow you to open the project demos?

item.title: Permission to remix “acoustic guitars” demo track?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Whoah, Acoustic Guitars?! Production Talk
I’ve also been inspired to start developing a track by the acoustic guitar demo loops, so… @Auxy, are we cleared to use the loops from the demo in tracks?
